definition: to welcome/to meet/to face/to forge ahead (esp. in the face of difficulties)
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: The two cars crossed on the road.

sentences.english: But the idea of tackling MDR-TB head-on has been a more recent development.

sentences.english: Stepping out of the aircraft, I was enveloped by tropical heat.

sentences.english: A sea gull flies right for you, but doesnt light on your outstretched hand.
